fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Premonition: You know what cards you'll draw next. *You may reroll them once.*

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Hypnotize: Pick a player. Pick which room they will enter tonight. Cannot be their home. [3 uses, 2 CD, Day-Only]
- Befuddle: Pick a player. All cards that they play in the next phase that has a non-self target will instead target a random different target. [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique]
- Dement: Choose a card a player will draw this phase. It will appear normal, but when played the target will gain a random negative status instantly (that is not Intoxicated). [Infinite uses, 2 CD, Astral]
